content.rendered:
Directed by Ahmed Khan

Written by Rajat Arora. Sajid Nadiadwala

Star Tiger Shroff (Babloo / RJ). Nawazuddin Siddiqui (Laila). Tara Sutaria (Inaaya). Amber Doig-Thorne (Dr. Julia Bulgaria). Mark Rhino Smith (Mark). Lee Westwick (Dylan). Vaibhav Choudhary. Sammy Jonas Heaney (Receptionist, backing dancer). Saira Pandhal (Ahana). Atul Sharma (Train Passenger). Alma Tillott (Train Passenger). Phil Tillott (Train Passenger). George Veck (Zombie). Anil Sanchania (Zombie). Natasha Powell (Hussain’s Wife). Taylor O’Brien (Zombie). Annishia Camilla Lunette (Dancer). Michael Lumb (Office Worker). Daisy Louve (Bob’s Assistant). Rofique Khan (Background villain). Mohammad Salman Khan (Tiger shroff friend). Ellie Keele (Zombie & Dancer). Pradip Gurung (Bob). Jessica Gilmartin (Dancer). Malin Frank (Dancer). Nithish (Varun). Swaylee Loughnane (Train passenger (credit only)). Rebecca Peace (Zombie). Daniel Eghan (Airline Pilot). Dontae Clarke Dos-Santos (Train Passenger). Simon Ellis (Magic Show Guest (uncredited)).Rest of cast listed alphabetically:. Iqra Ali (Iqra). Julie Angelique (Magic Trick Girl). Elizabeth Ann (Old Lady At Airport). Azzy Bagria (Guest appearance (as Bagria Azzy)). Kishore Bhatt (Airport Bystander). Saulius Cajauskas (Magic Show Attendee). Sajjad Delafrooz (Ranjeet Shenoy). Naresh Gosain (Dogra). Nisha Goyal (Dogra’s Wife). Tao Guo (Lee). Akdas Hayat (Musician (voice)). Sinead Hegarty (Hot Girl / Dancer). Zakhir Hussain (Asad Khan). Tunde Man Hussein (Black Henchman 2). Aloke Singh Influencer (Promoter). Roan Jackson (Interpol Officer 1).Jimmi Jaiswal . Pankaj Kansara (Tin Tin). Beren Nur Karadis (Club Hot Girl). Jenna Kerns (Dancer). Kecha Khamphakdee (Wong). Arham Khan (Musical Artist). Sharik Khan (Bunty’s friend). Shanu Kumar (Crew Team). Udhayabanu Maheshwaran (Uday Jha). Iftekhar Mahmud (Murad). Navneet Malik (Innaya ‘s Boyfriend).Mukesh .Paran Murmu . Celina Nessa (Train Passenger). Dave Nicholson (Interpol Officer 2). Nrbarz (Rapper). Jamie O’Rourke (Club Manager). Bonnie Oscar (Black Henchman 1). Daniel Osgood (Laila’s Bodyguard). Rajesh Panchal (Banker 2). Nikhil Parmar (Sharma – Khan Team Member). Natasha Powell (Hussain’s Wife). Pradabae (Prada). Oliver Price (Peter Malik). Pradeep Rajput (Guest appearance). Vikash Rajput (Vikash Rajput). Nikhil Bhupinder Singh Sachdev (Babloo’s Friend).Kriti Sanon . Eve-Yasmine Saoud-Easton (Dancer). Devansh Savernya (Rehnuma Musician). Aarash Shah (Fighter). Akhil Sharma (Rehnuma Musician). Saharsh Kumar Shukla (Debu Bhattacharya). Vaibhav Shukla (Banker). Chobber Sidhu (Graphics Designer). Abhinay Raj Singh (Bunty Cousin). Amrita Singh (Babloo’s Mother). Deependra Singh (Bhavesh). Kanwalpreet Singh (Babloo’s Friend). Chandni Srivastava (Khan Team Female Member). Amber Thomason (Hotel Room Couple). Vikas Verma (Ustad). Moa Wikberg (Dancer). Hani Yadav (Harsh)

Language Hindi

Producers Qaisar Bukhsh. Armen Greyg. Amit Gupta. Dipti Jindal. Firuzi Khan. Sushanto Sarkar. Shilpan Vyas Tinu

Production Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment
